Title: Relates to the purchase of fuel economy, battery, electric and hybrid passenger vehicles by the office of general services
Summary: Directs the commissioner of energy to adopt regulations increasing fuel economy standards for passenger vehicles purchased by or for the state or any agency or public authority thereof, and requires that by 2030 all such vehicles shall be battery, electric, plug-in hybrid electric or zero emission vehicles.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to the purchase of fuel economy, electric and hybrid passenger vehicles by the office of general services
